ContactMonthlyMetric.name: ContactMonthlyMetric
ContactMonthlyMetric.description: Represents the monthly engagement metrics for a contact.

AllCallsCallBackLater.description: The number of calls in the month for this contact with the call result Call Back Later.

AllCallsLeftVoicemail.description: The number of calls in the month for this contact with the call result Left Voicemail.

AllCallsMeaningfulConnect.description: The number of calls in the month for this contact with the call result Meaningful Connect.

AllCallsNotInterested.description: The number of calls in the month for this contact with the call result Not Interested.

AllCallsUncategorized.description: The number of calls in the month for this contact with no call result specified.

AllCallsUnqualified.description: The number of calls in the month for this contact with the call result Unqualified.

AllEmailsBouncedCount.description: The total of hard and soft bounced emails for this contact in the month.

AllEmailsDeliveredCount.description: The number of successfully delivered emails for this contact in the month.

AllEmailsDeliveredRate.description: The percentage of tracked emails sent that were successfully delivered to this contact. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

AllEmailsHardBouncedCount.description: The number of hard bounced emails for this contact in the month.

AllEmailsOutOfOfficeCount.description: The number of emails that triggered an out of office reply for this contact in the month.

AllEmailsSentCount.description: The number of emails sent to this contact in the month.

AllEmailsSoftBouncedCount.description: The number of emails soft bounced for this contact in the month.

AllEmailsTrackedSentCount.description: The number of emails sent to this contact with engagement tracking enabled in the month.

AllEmailsUntrackedSentCount.description: The number of emails sent to this contact without engagement tracking enabled in the month.

AllTotalCallsCount.description: The total number of calls to this contact with all call results in the month.

ContactId.description: The ID of the related contact.

HardBounceTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent to this contact with hard bounce tracking. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

LinkClickTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent to this contact with link click tracking. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

Month.description: The month in which the engagement occurred.

MonthInt.description: The month in which the engagement occurred, in yyyymm format.

OpenTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent to this contact with open tracking. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

OutOfOfficeTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent to this contact with out-of-office tracking. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

ReplyTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent to this contact with reply tracking. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

SoftBounceTrackableSends.description: The number of emails sent to this contact with soft bounce tracking. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableSendHardBounceRate.description: The percentage of emails sent to this contact with hard bounce tracking that hard bounced. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableSendLinkClickRate.description: The percentage of emails sent to this contact with link tracking that had link clicks. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableSendOpenRate.description: The percentage of emails sent to this contact with open tracking that were opened by the recipient. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableSendOutOfOfficeRate.description: The percentage of emails sent to this contact with out-of-office tracking that received out-of-office replies. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableSendReplyRate.description: The percentage of emails sent to this contact with reply tracking that received replies. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

TrackableSendSoftBounceRate.description: The percentage of emails sent to this contact with soft bounce tracking that soft bounced. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

UniqueEmailsLinkClickedCount.description: The number of individual emails in which the contact clicked a link in the month.

UniqueEmailsOpenedCount.description: The number of individual emails opened by the contact in the month.

UniqueEmailsRepliedCount.description: The number of individual emails replied to by the contact in the month.
